Text: RIP The best post war Prime Minister. She turned the country around, if only we had a leader like her now........

"best" and "politician" in the same sentence?
Surely you jest, Beau Geste.

I always thought all politicians should be lined against a wall and shot.
Anyone with designs to be a politician should immediately be barred from office.
I'm sure many agree.

One more for the Fletcher Memorial Home for Incurable Wasters of Life and Limb.

Adieu.

I say: down with politics. Death to politicians. Give us a true dictator! 

(i'm being sarcastic for ppl who cannot follow a thought to conclusion)

Like chumbawamba are politicly engaged... :rolleyes:
